page.title: 16TUR 3
page.content: Some of the pieces repaired there are, Electric Motors, Winding electric motors and High tentions electric motors which hold more than 5,000 volts. The Christmas holidays are 2 weeks long, they have 1 week at Easter and 2 weeks in summer. They work from egiht till four. They work seven and a half hours a day. The 1 year strike had a 9 month effect on their work. They have special water pump's under the mines to stop the mines from flooding. They fit these into the mines after they have closed and they keep on working 18 months's afterward. At Selby in Yorkshire where they have also built their own repair workshops. As the amount of work at Tursdale decreases. Not one can say how long they will continue operating.
